citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on
13-APR-17. The inspector contacted a person upon arriving at the facility. The person indicated that the license
holder was away and they didn't know when he would return.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany the inspection process during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on
13-APR-17.  The inspector contacted a person upon arriving at the facility.  The person indicated that the license
holder was away and they didn't know when he would return.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany the inspection process during business hours.
